level.name: Shadow Lands
level.story: The shadow lands is a dangerous place, even for a knight. You're not sure why your mentor asked you to meet in a place like this.

level.name: Forest
level.story: The forests have always been a beautiful part of the Kingdom. Your mentor has asked for you two to meet here.

level.name: Caves
level.story: These caves were once used for mining materials used to make weapons and armor for knights such as yourself. These caves have been deserted for years, why would the mentor ask you to come down here?

level.name: Castle
level.story: The castle was one your home, before the king went bonkers. Your mentor would like to meet you here, perhaps to reminisce.

level.name: Dungeon
level.story: Housing some of the most dangerous prisoners, the Dungeon is a fortress of scum. It's not your turn for guard duty, why would the mentor want to meet you here?

level.name: Fields
level.story: The fields are home to many of the peasants you protect on a daily basis. Your mentor has never taken kindly to these harsh lands, it seems odd that he would ask to meet here. Find him.

level.name: Shadow Lands
level.story: The shadow lands is a dangerous place, even for a knight. The princess has always been one for danger, you should find her.

level.name: Forest
level.story: The forests have always been a beautiful part of the Kingdom. The princess always chooses the most romantic places to meet. You should find her.

level.name: Caves
level.story: These caves were once used for mining materials used to make weapons and armor for knights such as yourself. Not the most romantic of places, but at least you and the Princess will be alone here. You should find her.

level.name: Castle
level.story: The castle was one your home, before the king went bonkers. The princess has been a little homesick after since the great war, but she shouldn't have come back to this place. Find her.

level.name: Dungeon
level.story: Housing some of the most dangerous prisoners, the Dungeon is a fortress of scum. This isn't exactly a place for a princess, you should find her.

level.name: Fields
level.story: The fields are home to many of the peasants you spit protect a daily basis. Perhaps the princess wanted to spend some time with the people. You should find her.

level.name: Shadow Lands
level.story: The shadow lands is a dangerous place, even for a knight. The village Oracle must be desperate if he asked you to meet in a place like this.

level.name: Forest
level.story: The forests have always been a beautiful part of the Kingdom. The letter from the Oracle said to meet him here. You should look for him.

level.name: Caves
level.story: These caves were once used for mining materials used to make weapons and armor for knights such as yourself. Why would the Oracle be down here? Oh well, walk around and find him.

level.name: Castle
level.story: The castle was one your home, before the king went bonkers. You haven't been here since the last time you were here. The Oracle mentioned that he'd be here by noon, you should find him.

level.name: Dungeon
level.story: Housing some of the most dangerous prisoners, the Dungeon is a fortress of scum. The Oracle hardly leaves his village, why would he want to meet here?

level.name: Fields
level.story: The fields are home to many of the peasants you protect on a daily basis. Fitting for the Oracle to ask you to meet him in his home land. You should look for him.
